about_the_game:
In this strategy auto battler you will create a powerful hero by choosing your own rogue-like adventure. Fight monsters, trade with merchants and train skills in order to make the strongest hero you can, then auto-battle against other players and come out on top!

This game features:

  • Auto-battling: The core gameplay revolves around the strategic decisions you make to acquire better items and stats for your character, combat for both PvE and PvP encounters is automatic: your character will use items when ever they are off cooldown.

  • Asynchronous PVP: During each round you make choices to improve your character, such as buying items or defeating monsters. At the end of each round you then auto-battle against another player's character in a PvP matchup. We use an asynchronous match-making system which means that you can take as long (or as short!) as you want to make your turn. There are no round time limits.

  • Ranked ladder with skill-based match-making: Play against other players of your own skill level for a fair and engaging experience. Earn ranked points by winning games and rise to the top of the ladder!

  • A globally shared item pool: Many other auto battler games implement a system called the "shared unit pool" within a lobby. This means that the units which appear in player's shops are randomly sampled from a shared pool, and when one player purchases a unit that unit can no longer be found by other players in the lobby. Auto Adventures uses a globally shared item pool, where the pool is shared across all players. This means that popular items will automatically become rarer, preventing every player from choosing  the same over-powered items and ensuring the meta stays fresh and varied.

Auto Adventures is, and will always be, free to play with cosmetic purchases only.
